title: Solutions Engineer II (presales) - Cloud and Cybersecurity
description:
**Job Description**
**Are you passionate about Internet technologies and cloud computing?**
**Do you love helping customers overcome challenges?**
**Join our Solutions Engineering team**
 The PreSales engineering team is the technical partner to Sales. We provide unanticipated value and strive to provide the right solutions to our customers. Our team possesses the deepest levels of technical understanding and builds relationships to understand customer business drivers. We match these to Akamai's technology, and clearly articulating complex solutions to our customers.
   

  

**Shape the future of the Internet**
 We work with world leading companies in every major industry to make the internet fast and secure. As Solutions Engineer, you'll build relationships, becoming a trusted advisor to our customers, delivering innovative solutions. You will get to work with all the technologies Akamai has to offer. You will become an expert in Cloud and Cybersecurity.
   

  

**As a Solutions Engineer, You Will Be Responsible For**
* Growing revenue and acquire new business by evangelizing Akamai's technology to existing and prospective customers.
* Managing the technical proposal process and ensuring all technical information and recommendations addressing customer requirements are accurate.
* Engaging with customers during the sales-cycle to gather requirements and develop proposals, design, delivery, demo's and proof-of-concepts.
* Collaborating with internal Stakeholders to strengthen customer relationships by becoming the go-to person for technical queries.


**Do What You Love**
 To be successful in this role you will:
   

  

* Have experience in a technical pre-sales/sales engineering, consulting, or customer facing role delivering technical products or services.
* Demonstrate knowledge in Cloud and Internet technologies, including security solutions, compute, content delivery and web architecture (DNS,HTTP,TCP/IP,TLS).
* Have interpersonal savvy, a passion to solve problems, and a customer focused mindset.
* Have a thirst for learning and embracing new technologies.
* Be a good team player, able to collaborate, prioritize, and solve problems in a fast changing environment.
* Be fluent in both Swedish and English


**Work in a way that works for you**
 FlexBase, Akamai's Global Flexible Working Program, is based on the principles that are helping us create the best workplace in the world. When our colleagues said that flexible working was important to them, we listened. We also know flexible working is important to many of the incredible people considering joining Akamai. FlexBase, gives 95% of employees the choice to work from their home, their office, or both (in the country advertised). This permanent workplace flexibility program is consistent and fair globally, to help us find incredible talent, virtually anywhere. We are happy to discuss working options for this role and encourage you to speak with your recruiter in more detail when you apply.
   

  

 Learn what makes Akamai a great place to work
   

  

 Connect with us on social and see what life at Akamai is like!
   

  

**We power and protect life online, by solving the toughest challenges, together.**
 At Akamai, we're curious, innovative, collaborative and tenacious. We celebrate diversity of thought and we hold an unwavering belief that we can make a meaningful difference. Our teams use their global perspectives to put customers at the forefront of everything they do, so if you are people-centric, you'll thrive here.
   

  

**Working for you**
**Benefits**
 At Akamai, we will provide you with opportunities to grow, flourish, and achieve great things. Our benefit options are designed to meet your individual needs for today and in the future. We provide benefits surrounding all aspects of your life:
   

  

* Your health
* Your finances
* Your family
* Your time at work
* Your time pursuing other endeavors


 Our benefit plan options are designed to meet your individual needs and budget, both today and in the future.
   

  

**About Us**
 Akamai powers and protects life online. Leading companies worldwide choose Akamai to build, deliver, and secure their digital experiences helping billions of people live, work, and play every day. With the world's most distributed compute platform from cloud to edge we make it easy for customers to develop and run applications, while we keep experiences closer to users and threats farther away.
   

  

**Join us**
 Are you seeking an opportunity to make a real difference in a company with a global reach and exciting services and clients? Come join us and grow with a team of people who will energize and inspire you!

title: Solution Architect within Identity and Access Management
description:
*Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in e-health with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our e-health solutions supports health care professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish healthcare. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.*
**The position**
 Are you passionate about security, architecture, and solving complex identity challenges? We're looking for a Solution Architect with deep expertise in Identity and Access Management (IAM) to help design and implement scalable, secure, and future-proof IAM solutions for our growing organization.
   

  

 In this position, you will work in close cooperation with our IAM lead architect, finding solutions that fit with Cambio strategies, our target architecture and our operational models. You will be part of our Enterprise Architecture team, shaping the future of Cambio’s solutions. The work focuses mainly on Cambio’s products and services – targeting our customers – but may also include internal IAM for employees.
   

  

**We offer**
 Join a highly skilled and motivated international team that plays a central role in Cambio’s mission to drive meaningful change in the healthcare and welfare sector. We bring together a unique combination of deep expertise and a holistic understanding of both our organization and the broader societal needs. Here, you’ll have the opportunity to see how strategic work with shaping the future can lead to delivery and implementation of real impactful solutions.
   

  

**You’ll Also Enjoy**
* A truly international work environment with annual gatherings that bring the whole team together
* A warm and inclusive team culture with strong “we-feeling” — we support each other through both big challenges and everyday matters
* Regular local team meetings and spontaneous office interactions that make collaboration smooth and enjoyable
* Exposure to cutting-edge technologies and innovative working methods
* Opportunities for continuous learning, career growth, and personal development
* Flexible work arrangements based on trust and responsibility


 Come grow with us and help shape the future of welfare services in Sweden.
   

  

**About You**
 We are looking for someone who understands the importance of IAM in a secure product or service delivery, as well as the role that IAM plays in the experience for our end users.
   

  

 You are structured, hands-on, and have a strong networking ability. You ensure that we document designs and present your solutions clearly to stakeholders. You like finding the best way to meet expectations and requirements and building your own virtual team.
   

  

**In This Position You Will Be Expected To**
* Design IAM solutions, integrating with modern and legacy systems in the cloud and on-premises.
* Apply IAM standards, frameworks, and road maps in alignment with security and business goals.
* Work with customer IAM teams to bring them on board, e.g. federating with their IdPs.
* Collaborate with development, operations, security, and product divisions to deliver robust identity solutions.
* Evaluate and recommend IAM tools, technologies, and third-party solutions.
* Provide technical guidance in authentication, authorization, federation, provisioning etc.
* Guide the organization through IAM transformations including migrations and new implementations.
* Create proofs-of-concept to evaluate different options.
* Trouble-shoot issues that may arise in complex authentication flows spanning Cambio’s products and customer IdPs.


 At Cambio, we value initiative and personal growth. Our culture is built on Trust, Care, and Together values we believe are important to both our work and our people. It’s important to us that you recognize and identify with these values.
   

  

**Requirements**
* Proven experience designing and implementing IAM architecture.
* Strong understanding of identity and security standards (OAuth2, OIDC, SAML, SCIM, LDAP, etc.).
* Ability to translate complex business needs into technical IAM solutions.
* Collaboration & networking genes – to work with different stakeholders to align IAM with business needs.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills.
* Proficiency in both Swedish and English, spoken and written.


**It's a bonus if you**
* Have worked with IAM solutions in larger companies or regions
* Have experience in the e-health sector.
* Have relevant certifications such as CISSP, CCSP, or vendor-specific certifications.
* Have experience with IGA (Identity Governance and Administration).


**Place of employment** 
 : Stockholm or Linköping
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full-time, hybrid work model (three days per week in-office)
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

 As it is currently vacation season, we will begin the selection process and start scheduling interviews in
 **week 34** 
 . We appreciate your patience and understanding during this time. We’ll be in touch as soon as we have an update regarding your application.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
**CAMBIO- FOR A HEALTHIER TOMORROW**
 Welcome to a company where healthcare is improved every day. Here you will work with leading technology in a collaborative, trusting and empowering environment where your contribution will be appreciated and celebrated. In our caring culture you will have the opportunity to pursue different paths of professional growth. Seize the opportunity to do the most important work of your life
 **.** 
 Read more about us
 **here!**
**A healthier tomorrow also means taking care of those who make it possible** 
**-** 
 explore our employee benefits
   

  

 Learn more about our recruitment process here.
   

  

 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at our career site.
   

  

 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Business Development Representative - Sweden (Solna HQ)
description:
Are you a proactive, detail-oriented and a genuinely curious person with prospecting experience?
   

  

 Would you like to work in a fast-growing company with global ambitions?
   

  

 If yes, this is a great opportunity for you.
   

  

 Paligo is now looking to grow our Business Development team as part of our global Sales expansion!
   

  

**Who We Are**
 Paligo is a fast-growing Swedish Headquartered, but globally dispersed SaaS company offering a cloud-based Component Content Management System (CCMS). Our platform enables global collaboration in creating, managing, translating, and publishing technical documentation.
   

  

 Being that we are founded and headquartered in Sweden means we believe in a progressive and employee-centric approach to work culture. This includes valuing work-life balance, empowerment and trust, employee welfare, and consensus driven decision making.
   

  

 We serve global enterprises including Dell, Emerson Electric, Mitsubishi, and Samsara. Our mission is to become the #1 CCMS provider by delivering exceptional features, customer value, and satisfaction. Now we’re looking for a new team member to help take us even further.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Business Development Representative, you’ll be a key part of our global Sales organization. You will work in a dedicated "pod" consisting of an Account Executive and a Solutions Engineer, focusing on a specific regional sales territory. Together, your pod will own pipeline development and drive high-value opportunities.
   

  

**You’ll**
* Research target accounts and identify key personas and ideal customer profiles
* Craft tailored outreach via email, phone, LinkedIn, and video to engage prospects
* Book qualified meetings and collaborate with your pod for smooth handovers
* Track activities and insights in HubSpot CRM
* Receive ongoing coaching and support to build a long-term career in SaaS sales


**About You**
 You’re a curious, communicative, and goal-driven person who thrives in a fast-paced environment. You enjoy learning, collaborating with others, and contributing to ambitious goals.
   

  

**You Have**
* Native or fluent English proficiency
* 1+ year of experience in outbound sales, lead generation, or business development
* A proactive and positive attitude – you don’t wait for instructions, you create momentum
* Strong communication skills via email, phone, Zoom, and LinkedIn
* Good time management and organization


**Nice To Have**
* Experience with HubSpot, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Apollo, or Gong
* Knowledge of the CMS, CCMS, TMS or localization industries
* Additional language skills (especially German or French)
* A track record of meeting or exceeding activity or booking targets


**What We Offer**
 At Paligo, you’ll be at the heart of a fast-growing, small but global dispersed SaaS company where your work makes a real impact. You’ll be challenged, supported, and given space to grow, all while working hybrid office arrangement.
   

  

 We stay connected through regular team check-ins and informal Google Meet sessions, and we believe in open communication, shared learning, and supporting each other along the way.
   

  

 We offer flexible hours, health-promoting initiatives, generous time off, annual company flybacks (locations vary) and competitive benefits — because work/life balance matters. If this sounds like a place where you'd thrive, we’d love to hear from you!
   

  

 Paligo is an end-to-end Component Content Management System (CCMS) solution for technical documentation, policies and procedures, knowledge management, and more.

title: Lösningsarkitekt inom mjukvaruutveckling - Castra
description:
**Vi utmanar de traditionella konsultbolagen och vi kan med stolthet säga att Castra är konsultbranschens mest utvecklande arbetsplats där allt är möjligt. Känns det här som företaget för dig så läs gärna vidare.**
**Rollen**
 Som Lösningsarkitekt inom mjukvaruutveckling kommer du att inneha en central roll i att definiera och skapa övergripande tekniska lösningar för komplexa mjukvaruprojekt hos våra kunder. Du kommer att arbeta nära företagets ledning och teknikteam för att utforma arkitekturen och säkerställa att mjukvarusystemen uppfyller företagets strategiska mål och tekniska krav. Du kommer att säkerställa att tekniska lösningar stödjer företagets mål och att systemarkitekturen är stabil, skalbar och säker.
   

  

**Erfarenhet**
 Du har en stark bakgrund inom mjukvaruutveckling samt arkitekturarbete i agila utvecklingsprocesser och har fördelaktigt moderniserat mjukvarulösningar förr.
   

  

 Vi ser även att du har:
   

  

* Bakgrund inom utveckling med erfarenhet av exempelvis Java, C#/.Net, Python samt diverse ramverk
* Förmåga att förstå och översätta företagets strategiska mål till tekniska krav och lösningar.
* Design av systemarkitekturer med hänsyn till skalbarhet, prestanda och säkerhet.
* Skapande av tekniska specifikationer och arkitekturdokumentation.
* Erfarenhet av molnbaserad arkitektur och tjänster som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud.
* Kunskap containerteknik som Docker och Kubernetes


 Låter detta som du? Hör av dig så tar vi ett möte i veckan!
   

  

**Varför ska du välja oss?**
 Här tror vi på frihet, möjligheter och medbestämmande. Att du som medarbetare ska ha möjlighet att utvecklas och forma ditt arbete utefter dina intressen och prioriteringar i livet. Att alla får vara med och forma och påverka bolaget genom delägarskap, advisory board och projektgrupper. Att det är viktigt att ha ett sammanhang, känna tillhörighet och att man har kollegor som stöttar, utvecklar och tror på en.
   

  

**Om Castra**
 Castra är en entreprenörsdriven konsultgrupp inom IT, management och systemutveckling. Bolaget ägs gemensamt av medarbetarna och tillsammans bygger vi det företag vi själva vill jobba på.
   

  

 Vår vision är att vi ska vara Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare för konsulter. Att vi blivit certifierade av Great Place to Work® fem år i rad är ett bevis på våra höga mål kring företagskultur. Våra tankar om delaktighet, påverkansmöjligheter och respekt för individens egna val och möjligheter fungerar.
   

  

 Företaget har kontor i Göteborg, Stockholm, Helsingborg, Sundsvall, Malmö, Linköping, Norrköping, Örebro och Jönköping. Mer information om Castra-koncernen hittar du på vår hemsida www.castra.se.
   

  

 Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss på castra.se/konsulterbjudande/
   

  

**Har vi lyckats väcka din nyfikenhet?** 
 Sök via länken eller hör av dig till Charlotta.Ljung@Castra.se

title: DevOps Tech Lead
description:
**About the Company** 




  





  





 We are seeking a passionate and innovative DevOps Tech Lead to join our Platform Delivery and Reliability Services (PDRS) team. If you excel in a dynamic and technically demanding environment, we want you on our team! Join us and become part of a team that values innovation, collaboration, and excellence.
 



  





  





**About the Role** 




  





  





 As a DevOps Tech Lead, you will be solving architectural challenges, planning current and future work, as well as provide insight, communication and leadership. You will be instrumental in leading the development of a fully automated platform by overseeing the design and maintenance of Kubernetes environments as well as managing Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) tools.
 



  





  





**Responsibilities** 




  





  




* Give strategic direction when it comes to design, implementation, and maintenance of CI/CD pipeline tools.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to seamlessly integrate DevOps practices into the development lifecycle.
* Enhance platform scalability, reliability, and security across cloud and on-premises environments.
* Drive DevOps best practices, fostering a culture of automation, collaboration, and continuous improvement.
* Identify and analyze incidents, develop and implement effective solutions.
* Keep up to date with the latest tools, trends, and technologies, and share knowledge within the team.



  





  





**Qualifications** 




  





  




* Advanced or expert in all layers of the DevOps work field.
* Deep understanding of containerized applications and container orchestration tools such as Kubernetes, EKS etc.
* Advanced Kubernetes Administration skills.
* Expertise with IaC tools such as Terraform, Ansible, and Kubernetes Operator.
* Strong Linux administration skills.
* Excellent troubleshooting abilities.
* Strong knowledge within programming or scripting languages, such as Python and Groovy.
* Expertise in designing and building reusable CI/CD pipelines using industry-standard tools like Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Bitbucket Pipelines, and TeamCity.
* Experience with private and public cloud technologies, such as VMware/Openstack, and AWS/GCP/Azure.
* Knowledge of registry and asset management tools such as Artifactory.
* Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to foster partnerships and drive cross-functional alignment.
* Ability to clearly express requirements and expectations to a wide range of individuals - and to understand stakeholders' requirements and see how they influence the course of action.
* Identify and define technical solutions with respect to short, middle, and long-term strategies.
* Experience and interest in working with AI and AI tools is a plus.



  





  





**Pay range and compensation package** 




  





  





 Our world is hybrid. A career is not a sprint. It’s a marathon. One of the perks of joining us is that we value you as a person first. Our hybrid world allows you to focus on your goals and responsibilities and lets you self-organise to improve your deliveries and get the work done in your own way.
 



  





  





**Equal Opportunity Statement** 




  





  





 We believe talent knows no boundaries. Our hiring process focuses solely on your skills, experience, and potential to contribute to our team. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds and evaluate each candidate based on merit, regardless of personal characteristics as the age, gender, origin, religion, sexual orientation, neurodiversity or disability.

title: Senior Solutions Architect, Generative AI, Startups, AWS
description:
**Description**
 AWS Sales, Marketing, and Global Services (SMGS) is responsible for driving revenue, adoption, and growth from the largest and fastest growing small- and mid-market accounts to enterprise-level customers including public sector.
   

  

 Trusted by more startups around the world, AWS makes the power of cloud computing accessible for all by giving founders everywhere access to the same technology that powers the world’s largest companies. With nearly 20 years of experience gained from supporting hundreds of thousands of startups that have come before, we help founders prove that their world-changing ideas are possible, at any stage of growth or level of funding. This is why more startups, and over 80% of unicorns, build on AWS.
   

  

 Startup Solutions Architects work hand in hand with AWS customers to help them make the most of the Cloud. They are at the crossroads of business and technology and engage with startups of different stages. Supporting the overall technical relationship between customers and AWS, they work to understand the customer's business needs and give prescriptive guidance on how to create business value with technology. Solutions Architects also have broader impact at scale, taking a supporting role in creating and presenting technical content and best practices.
   

  

 In this role you will get to practice your creativity, linking technology to tangible solutions and educating AWS customers about the art of the possible. You will have the opportunity to refine cloud-native reference architectures for a variety of use cases. You will have the support to grow your expertise in industry and technology areas of depth. Every day you will be learning something new from your customers, your peers and your own experiments.
   

  

 You will be part of a team that is responsible for driving adoption of AWS technologies while bringing differentiated value to customers. This is a team dedicated to Startups, an important and growing subset of customers for AWS. Startups follow unique technology adoption patterns and growth trajectories that distinguish them from traditional businesses, so you will be employing engagement strategies and programs tailored to their business needs and technical preferences.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* As a Solutions Architect, you will work directly with customers to accelerate their challenging projects and recommend best-practice architectures in line with their long-term business outcomes.
* You operate as a trusted advisor for startups. The best interests of the customer will shape the guidance you provide. You work backwards from their priorities and find inventive ways to add value with solutions utilizing AWS and its Partners’ technology.
* You capture and share the voice of the customer to influence the roadmap of new features and services for AWS. You use your customer understanding to participate in the creation or updates of technical content and reference architectures (e.g. white papers, code samples, blog posts).
* Evangelize and educate about AWS technology (e.g. workshops, user groups, meetups, public speaking, online videos or conferences).


 To be successful in this role you need to be passionate about startups and cloud architectures. You are a builder with genuine curiosity about how technology can support your customers’ business models and objectives. You are a lifetime learner that develops areas of depth in technical domains relevant to your interests and your customer's outcomes. You are prepared to work in a fast-paced environment, where you will be positively challenged and consistently embrace the Amazon Culture.
   

  

 A day in the life
   

  

 The Solutions Architect team at AWS is responsible for helping customers successfully implement cloud technologies. In a typical week you will meet multiple customers and you will collaborate with them on designing and operating well-architected solutions. You will earn their trust and show them the art of the possible, educating them around the capabilities of AWS. Partnering with internal teams and experts, leveraging a deep knowledge of our tools and products, you’ll craft highly-scalable, flexible, and resilient cloud architectures that address our customers’ business problems. As part of our team, you’ll have the opportunity to continuously learn and innovate daily.
   

  

 The startup organization at AWS comprises experts from across the global ecosystem, including former founders and CTOs, venture capitalists, angel investors, and mentors who upskill today's founders to navigate challenges and opportunities as they build their business, and our Startup Solutions Architect team is where the magic happens. is dedicated to working with startup companies as they build and scale their businesses. We’re here to make sure that they can deploy the best, most scalable, and most secure architectures possible – and that they spend as little time and money as possible doing so. We are a group of technologists with varied backgrounds; from fresh graduates to ex-CTOs, all growing our skills and startup expertise, while working on cutting edge technology use-cases with some of the world’s most innovative companies. For Solutions Architect who like to invent, there's no better place to build than on the AWS Startup SA team.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS?
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship and Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Experience with building, validating and deploying GenAI models and applications on cloud infrastructure.
* Sound knowledge of machine learning fundamentals, with working knowledge of frameworks such as Pytorch, TensorFlow, JAX or MXNet.
* Knowledge of MLOps tools and workflows for model development, validation, and deployment.
* High level of communicating effectively across internal and external organizations, with both technical and non-technical audiences.
* Fluent written and verbal communications skills in Swedish and English with demonstrated ability to communicate technical choices to business and technology stakeholders.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Professional experience architecting/operating solutions built on AWS and/or AWS certification (e.g. AWS Solutions Architect Associate or Professional)
* Hands-on experience benchmarking and optimizing performance of models on accelerated computing (GPU, TPU, AI ASICs) clusters with high-speed networking.
* Understanding of technical details and techniques used in tuning generative AI foundation models using techniques like RAG, PEFT, RLHF, DPO
* Experience scaling model training and inference using technologies like Slurm, ParallelCluster, Amazon SageMaker
* Experience in developing and deploying large scale machine learning or deep learning models and/or systems into production, including batch and real-time data processing


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)

title: Paid Ads Manager
description:
**Paid Ads Manager till Nordens största marknadsplats för SaaS-tjänster – Ta ägarskap över vår Paid Ads-strategi!**
 Vi söker en erfaren Paid Ads specialist som vill äga, driva och utveckla våra existerande annonseringsinsatser samt utforska nya kanaler som YouTube och TikTok. Du är en strategisk tänkare med ett praktiskt “doer”-mindset och brinner för att optimera kampanjer och skapa mätbara resultat. Hos oss får du helhetsansvar för Paid Ads och arbetar tätt med marknadsteamet för att maximera tillväxten.
   

  

 Vi har arbetat med betald annonsering sedan 2018 och har ett väletablerat arbetssätt att bygga vidare på. All annonsering inom Paid Search och LinkedIn Ads sker in-house, medan Meta sköts tillsammans med stöd från extern byrå. Nu vill vi båda växa i fler marknader och testa fler kanaler.
   

  

 I rollen rapporterar du direkt till vår CMO och arbetar nära vår SEO-manager för att integrera Paid och Organic. Vi är ett av de 50 snabbast växande teknikföretagen i Sverige enligt Deloitte Fast 50 och är även ett DI Gasellföretag.
   

  

**Om företaget**
 BusinessWith är Nordens största marknadsplats för SaaS-tjänster med över 3 500 listade leverantörer. Varje månad hjälper vi tusentals företag att hitta rätt system – från världsledande aktörer till lokala leverantörer. Vi står just nu mitt i en europeisk expansion och letar efter vår nästa kollega som vill äga området Paid Ads och lyfta det till nya nivåer. Teamet på 13 personer arbetar från centrala kontor i Stockholm och Göteborg, där balans och trivsel är viktiga värden. Vi ses gärna på kontoret några dagar i veckan, men det finns inget närvarokrav.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som Paid Ads Manager ansvarar du för strategi, optimering och rapportering inom Paid Ads. Du kommer att:
   

  

* Driva och utveckla kampanjer på Google Ads, Bing Ads, Meta Ads och Linkedin Ads
* Testa nya kanaler som YouTube och TikTok
* Samarbeta med byrå (Meta) och analysera resultat för bästa ROI
* Utföra A/B-tester och arbeta datadrivet
* Identifiera och etablera nya kanaler och format


**Krav & kvalifikationer**
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av Google Ads, Bing Ads och Meta Ads
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att skapa, optimera och skala kampanjer
* Stark analytisk förmåga och erfarenhet av mätning (t.ex. Google Analytics, Tag Manager)
* Förståelse för hela funneln – från annons till konvertering
* Självgående och lösningsorienterad
* Erfarenhet av SaaS & B2B är meriterande


**Vem är du?**
 Du kombinerar strategiskt tänkande med praktisk hands-on-erfarenhet. Du är trygg i att ta ägarskap över Paid Ads och gillar att både förvalta och vidareutveckla befintliga processer. Erfarenhet av att arbeta i kanaler som YouTube eller TikTok är meriterande, likaså om du arbetat nära byråer.
   

  

**Vad vi erbjuder**
 Vi befinner oss i en spännande tillväxtfas och erbjuder en hybrid arbetsmiljö där du får ta en central roll i vår annonseringsstrategi och expansion i Europa. Vill du vara med på resan? Skicka in din ansökan och bli en del av teamet!

title: Enterprise Data Migration Architect
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Business Consulting and Services
description:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU — people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.
   

  

 At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for a Data Migration Architect to join our team in Sweden.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Cognizant collaborates with all major hyperscale’s and relevant software vendors in the data and AI space. This includes partnerships with industry leaders such as AWS, Microsoft, Google, Snowflake, and Databricks. Our comprehensive approach ensures that we leverage the best tools and technologies to deliver scalable, secure, and efficient solutions. Additionally, we are supported locally by our dedicated Centres of Excellence, which operate both nearshore and offshore. These centres provide specialized expertise and resources, ensuring that we can meet the unique needs of our clients and drive innovation in AI and data cost effectively.
   

  

**About The Role**
 A Data Migration Architect specializing in Teradata to Snowflake migrations designs and executes end-to-end data migration projects, ensuring a smooth transition to the cloud-based Snowflake platform. This role involves understanding customer needs, developing comprehensive migration plans, and collaborating with various teams to achieve seamless data movement and minimize downtime. Snowflake Migration Specialist will play a key role in the migration process, ensuring the successful transition of data from legacy systems to Snowflake. This position requires a deep understanding of Snowflake, data warehousing concepts, and cloud-based data architectures
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Architect secure, scalable, and high-performance data pipelines to support enterprise data modernization initiatives.
* Assess legacy systems and define comprehensive migration roadmaps.
* Ensure seamless data transfer with minimal disruption to business operations.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align data architecture with business goals.
* Enforce data governance policies and ensure compliance with security and regulatory standards.
* Provide technical leadership in optimizing data workflows and managing metadata.
* Implement best practices for data quality, lineage, and overall data lifecycle management.


**Requirements**
* Cloud Data Platforms: Deep expertise in Snowflake (Delta Lake, Unity Catalog, Lakehouse architecture)
* Data Migration Tools: Experience with tools like Azure Data Factory, IDMS, or custom migration frameworks
* ETL/ELT Development: Designing and orchestrating pipelines using Apache Spark or ADF
* SQL & Performance Tuning: Advanced SQL for data transformation, optimization, and troubleshooting
* Data Modeling: Proficiency in dimensional modeling, data vault, and schema design for analytical workloads
* Programming/Scripting: Python, Scala, or SQL for data engineering and automation
* Monitoring & Optimization: Tools like Datadog, Azure Monitor, or Snowflake Query Profiler for performance tuning


**Advantage**
* Snowflake certification (e.g., SnowPro Core, SnowPro Advanced) is highly desirable.
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines for data engineering.


**What You Can Expect**
* Become part of a ‘flag ship’ success story - We go through enormous growth!
* Organization driven by technology – We have a tremendous technology backbone
* Environment where you can make your own ideas reality
* Drive your own career
* Market conforms benefits

title: Data Platform Architect
description:
**Title:** 
 Data Platform Architect
   

  

**Reports to:** 
 Head of Architecture
   

  

**Group:** 
 Digital and Synthetic
 **Capability:** 
 Architecture
   

  

**Level:** 
 S5
   

  

**Work Arrangement:** 
 Hybrid
   

  

**Company Overview**
 Metrea is a defense company dedicated to translating commercial innovation into solutions for the hardest problems in national security. With deep mission expertise, Metrea focuses on delivering effects-as-a-service across Aerospace, Electromagnetic & Cyber, Digital & Synthetic domains via its capability groups. Metrea also consists of six support groups (Operations, People, Finance, Legal, Strategy and Solutions) that guide the development of specific capabilities that Metrea's files (product, projects, programs etc) leverage to achieve their targets.
   

  

**Group Overview**
 The
 **Digital and Synthetic Capability Unit (D&S)** 
 is committed to providing mission-driven information solutions that seamlessly bridge the digital and physical realms. Leveraging cutting-edge technologies and advanced platforms, we empower operational readiness and elevate situational awareness across diverse domains—including air, maritime, and space.
   

  

**Position Summary**
 We are seeking an experienced Data Platform Architect to lead a cross-functional data & cloud engineering team in the design and implementation of our next-generation cloud-native data platform.
   

  

 This role will be responsible for architecting a comprehensive data ecosystem that supports diverse data ingestion and consumption patterns, advanced data structures, and appropriate storage solutions while owning and adhering to our data ontology.
   

  

**Role And Responsibilities**
**Architecture & Design**
* Design and architect scalable, cloud-native data platform solutions supporting both real-time and batch processing workloads
* Define data architecture patterns, data models, and integration strategies across heterogeneous data sources
* Establish API-first design principles and create comprehensive API specifications for data services
* Design data governance frameworks, security models, and compliance strategies
* Create technical roadmaps and guide technology stack decisions


**Technical Leadership**
* Lead a cross-functional team including data engineers, cloud engineers, and software engineers
* Collaborate with data scientists and analytics teams to understand platform requirements for advanced use cases
* Drive architectural reviews and technical decision-making processes
* Mentor engineering teams on best practices for data platform development
* Establish coding standards, design patterns, and operational procedures


**Platform Strategy**
* Evaluate and recommend technologies for data ingestion, processing, storage, and serving layers
* Design multi-tenant, self-service data platform capabilities
* Architect solutions for data lineage, quality monitoring, and observability
* Plan for platform scalability, performance optimization, and cost management
* Ensure platform supports diverse data types (structured, semi-structured, streaming)


**Stakeholder Collaboration**
* Work closely with product managers to translate business requirements into technical solutions
* Partner with security and compliance teams to ensure data protection and regulatory adherence
* Collaborate with infrastructure teams on cloud resource planning and optimization
* Present architectural decisions and trade-offs to leadership and technical teams


**Skills And Experience**
* 8+ years of experience in data engineering, platform architecture, or related fields
* Technologist with proven experience in building innovative and ground-breaking data solutions.
* Proven experience architecting large-scale data platforms in cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP) and leading technical teams
* Deep understanding of data processing frameworks (Spark, Kafka, Flink, Airflow)
* Strong knowledge of data storage technologies (data lakes, data warehouses, NoSQL, streaming)
* Experience with containerization, orchestration (Kubernetes, Docker), and microservices and event-driven architectures
* Proficiency in API design and development (REST, GraphQL, gRPC, JSON, Kafka)
* Understanding of data governance, security, and compliance frameworks
* Excellent communication skills with ability to present complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
* Solid programming fundamentals with ability to review code and guide technical decisions across multiple languages
* Experience with Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
* Knowledge of monitoring and observability tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack)
* Experience with data catalog and metadata management tools


**Additional Eligibility Qualifications**
* Advanced degree in Computer Science or Engineering
* Understanding of analytics and data science workflows
* Certification in major cloud platforms
* Experience with data mesh or federated data architecture patterns


**Our Culture**
 Metrea’s single core value, “rooted in humility,” is supported by four key attributes: entrepreneurial, systematic, discerning, and over-deliver. These attributes, combined, form our Teammate Firmware, our culture. We explore these attributes during the hiring process when we grow our teams and continually support the growth of our culture. We are a hyper-collaborative, dynamically hierarchical organization united by a passion for what we do, how we do it, who we do it with, and who we do it for.
   

  

**Benefits**
 D&S UK
   

  

 Private Medical Insurance
   

  

 Subsided gym membership / plans through Wellhub
   

  

 Electric Car scheme
   

  

 Cycle to work scheme
   

  

 £1500 Training Allowance
   

  

 30 days annual PTO plus b/h
   

  

 Eye Tests
   

  

 D&S Sweden
   

  

 Friskvård of 5K annually
   

  

 Personal development budget (2K for books, courses, subscriptions etc)
   

  

 Parental leave
   

  

 5% occupational pension (swe. tjänstepension),
   

  

 30 days of leave
   

  

 Discretionary Bonus
   

  

**Right to Work**
 The employee will have the legal right to work in the United Kingdom and will be able to produce right to work documentation.
   

  

**Work Authorization / Security Clearance**
 Ability to achieve and maintain a Security Clearance.
   

  

**Equal Opportunities Statement**
 Metrea Management is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or other characteristics protected by law.
   

  

**Position Type and Expected Hours of Work**
 This is a full-time non-exempt position with typical working hours of Monday through Friday, 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Hours and work shifts may change in accordance with department and business needs. Exempt Employees must have the ability to be on-call and available, as business needs require. Non-Exempt employees may be required to work over 40 hours per week with approval from the department manager.
   

  

**Work Location**
 UK / Sweden
   

  

**Work Environment**
 This job operates in an office setting

title: Lösningsarkitekt, Digital Arbetsplats, Solna
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Workplace-avdelningen har idag cirka 15 teammedlemmar som ansvarar för PostNords IT-arbetsplats för både administrativ och produktionspersonal. IT Arbetsplatsen är under ständig utveckling och vi strävar alltid efter säkra, pålitliga och användarvänliga tjänster. I vårt arbete håller vi kontinuerligt ett öga på PostNords övergripande vision och strategier för att säkerställa att IT Arbetsplatsen möjliggör och stödjer företagets marknadspositionering.
   

  

 Vi söker nu en lösningsarkitekt som främst kommer att fokusera på att utveckla och stötta våra service managers inom området för digital arbetsplats (enheter och applikationer).
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 I rollen som lösningsarkitekt (Engineer) med fokus på enheter och applikationer, kommer du att arbeta med både interna kollegor och externa leverantörer. Kommunikation är viktig för rollen vilket ställer höga krav på språkförståelse vilket omfattar svenska samt engelska.
   

  

**Design Och Strategi**
 Rollen innebär bland annat att arbeta med:
   

  

* Samarbeta nära med service managers och intressenter för att förstå och stötta affärsmål.
* Utveckla framåtsträvande planer för plattformar, enheter och applikationer.
* Föreslå tekniska lösningar för tjänster såsom Citrix, Intune och applikationshantering.
* Rekommendera nya teknologier och branschpraxis.


**Lösningsrådgivning Och Optimering**
* Leda implementeringen av strategier och säkerställa att standarder följs.
* Samarbeta med olika team för att integrera lösningar.
* Ge råd om optimering av teknologier som Citrix och Intune.


**Intressentsamarbete Och Kommunikation**
* Erbjuda expertvägledning och konsultation till service managers och produktägare.
* Översätta intressenternas behov till konkreta tekniska krav.


 Denna tjänst erbjuder dig möjlighet att bidra med din expertis i en strategisk och samarbetsinriktad roll för att skapa en modern och effektiv IT-arbetsplats.
   

  

* Teknisk expertis inom Citrix, Intune, paketering, utskriftshantering.
* Erfarenhet av outsourcade arbetsmiljöer och förmåga att effektivt samarbeta på distans.
* Problemlösning och analytisk förmåga.
* kommunikations- och interpersonella färdigheter för att effektivt samarbeta med intressenter på alla nivåer.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och leverera resultat inom angivna tidsramar.
* Relevanta certifieringar (t.ex. Citrix Certified Expert - Virtualization, Microsoft Certified: Enterprise Administrator Expert) är ett plus.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med ITIL-processer och ramverk.
* Svenska och engelska, flytande i tal och skrift.


 Vi tror att du är en person som redan har ett stort intresse för området digital arbetsplats. Ditt arbetssätt är inkluderande, strukturerat och ansvarsfullt. Du är kommunikativ, lätt att samarbeta med och säkerställer att ditt arbetssätt skapar och vårdar långsiktiga relationer.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig**
 Vi Erbjuder En Roll Som En Del Av Vårt Dynamiska Team Som Inkluderar Tjänsteansvariga, Ingenjörer Och En Chefsarkitekt. Roller Inom Workplace Är Dedikerade Till Vissa Lösningsområden Och Ansvarar För Att Styra Outsourcade Arbetsplatstjänster Och/eller Några Av De Internt Hanterade Tjänsterna. Det Dagliga Arbetet Varierar i En Internationell Miljö Med Ständigt Nya Utmaningar Och Snabba Beslut. Här Har Du Möjligheter Att Utveckla Kreativa Lösningar Och Arbeta i En Prestigelös Grupp Där Vi Gemensamt Hjälper Till Att Nå Våra Mål. PostNord Är En Av Sveriges Största Arbetsplatser Och Vi Erbjuder Trygga Anställningsvillkor Och Förmåner. Utöver De Förmåner Som Nämns Ovan Erbjuder Vi
   

  

* Hybrid arbetsplats med en nordisk och dynamisk miljö. Se videon om vårt kontor.
* Stora utvecklingsmöjligheter
* Bra försäkrings- och pensionsvillkor
* Friskvårdsbidrag och möjlighet att träna på Arkens gym och inomhuspool
* Medarbetarförmåner genom PostNord Plus - PostNords egen personalstiftelse


**Vi gör vardagen enklare**
 PostNord är den ledande leverantören av kommunikations- och logistiklösningar till, från och inom Norden. Vi säkerställer tillhandahållandet av posttjänster till hushåll och företag i Sverige och Danmark. Vi strävar efter att göra vardagen enklare och mer hållbar för alla som bor och arbetar i Norden. Vi är i ständig omvandling och arbetar konsekvent för att utveckla både vårt erbjudande och våra medarbetare, allt för att uppnå vår vision att vara Nordens favorittransportör. Vi är PostNord - ett fantastiskt företag att arbeta och växa med. Läs mer på postnord.com
   

  

**Ansök**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan! Om du har några frågor eller funderingar, vänligen kontakta Susanne Wetterstrand på telefonnummer: +46 72-585 32 85. Vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan då vi går igenom ansökningarna löpande. På grund av semestertider kan svarstiderna bli något längre än vanligt, men vi återkommer så snart vi kan – främst under augusti.
   

  

 För fackliga representanter, besök: Facklig kontakt | PostNord
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Product Classification Engineer
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun - leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation - for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we’ll give you what you need to make it happen. It won’t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you’ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.


This Position reports to:


BL Ports Global Sales Manager **Your role and responsibilities**


You will be part of the Ports business line within the Marine and Ports division that specialized in delivering proven and future-proof automation and electrification solutions to container terminals worldwide. We offer an international and dynamic working environment where our business delivers advanced technology in large projects across the world in a customer oriented and highly globalized industry.


We are looking for a Product Classification Engineer to join our team. The selected candidate will be overall responsible to maintain and encourage colleagues to follow the established processes for classification of Products, Software, and executing Product classification work. He/she will connect with other areas such as Procurement & Logistics/Product Management/Sales/R&D to successfully perform the activities.

* Review existing product master data for determining the accuracy of the Customs Tariff Numbers (CTNs, HS codes) and the Export Control Classification Numbers (ECCN/ECN) and update if needed.
* Maintain high knowledge of current rules and regulations regarding classification of products and software.
* Conduct the classification work for the new products and software that are to be released to the market.
* Document how products and software have been classified, both for the customs purposes (HS codes, CTNs) and for the export control purposes (ECCN, ECN codes).
* Participate in projects or initiatives to improve the work of classification of Products, Software, or resolve gaps or problems identified, also build while enforcing the product classification processes.
* Deliver in-house training and understanding to business colleagues where necessary.

**Qualifications for the role**

* Minimum two years of higher education or vocational training in the field of transport and logistics.
* A good understanding of technical specifications, performance characteristics and descriptions of manufacturing materials.
* Experience in Product Classification and international trade compliance.
* Strong general analytical skills, including the ability to apply regulatory concepts and definitions as well as ABB classification strategies to the case-by-case determination of product classifications.
* Ability to establish and coordinate a network of contacts to work within the Organization.
* Ability to work effectively in a team as well as independently.
* Knowledge of Customs Tariff Numbers
* Fluency in English and Swedish, both written and spoken.

**What’s in it for you?**


We empower you to take initiative, challenge ideas, and lead with confidence. You’ll grow through meaningful work, continuous learning, and support that’s tailored to your goals. Every idea you share and every action you take contributes to something bigger.


Our benefits? Competitive, comprehensive, and crafted with you in mind.

**More about us**


ABB's Marine & Ports division drives efficiency, safety, and a clean maritime future through electric, automated, and digital solutions. Our integrated solutions and lifecycle services for ship and shore help owners and operators of vessels and cargo terminals optimize performance, increase reliability and reduce emissions. From the pioneering Azipod® propulsion system to advanced automation and digital connectivity, we prepare the maritime industry to meet the demands of tomorrow.


With a team of 2,000 experts operating from 26 locations worldwide, we bring over 100 years of industry experience. To date, we have electrified more than 1,500 ships, automated over 1,700 container cranes, and digitally connected more than 2,000 vessels and terminals. At ABB, our mission is to help industries outrun–leaner and cleaner. Learn more about what we do at www.abb.com/ports.

Interested in joining the crew? Apply for the position by September 16th. Please note that the applications are reviewed on an ongoing basis. We look forward to receiving your application. If you want to discover more about ABB, take another look at our website www.abb.com.


We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.

title: Research Engineer (NLP & Generative AI)
description:
About the Role
  
  

Join Neo4j's Generative AI (GenAI) team, where we are building advanced AI and machine learning solutions. As an AI Research Scientist, you will be instrumental in designing and developing the next generation systems for language understanding, entity extraction, and entity resolution. Your work will blend research with practical application to create graph-powered solutions for our GenAI product suite.
  
  

Key Responsibilities
  
  

Design and develop AI systems for natural language processing, entity extraction, and entity resolution, focusing on scalability and performance.
  
  

Conduct research to improve algorithms and models for NLP and entity-centric systems.
  
  

Build and deploy AI solutions, integrating them with Neo4j’s graph database technologies.
  
  

Work with engineering and product teams to incorporate research findings into customer-facing products.
  
  

Share expertise with colleagues to support team projects and goals.
  
  

Minimum Qualifications
  
  

PhD in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, or a related field.
  
  

3+ years of experience (including PhD work) in NLP, entity extraction, or entity resolution, with a focus on applying research to practical systems.
  
  

Proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, or Hugging Face Transformers.
  
  

Experience with software development practices, including version control and model deployment.
  
  

Familiarity with graph databases or knowledge graphs is a plus.

title: Senior Power System Engineer for Power Consulting Sweden
description:
**Description**


Seize this opportunity to take on a highly visible position in a global organization. As a Senior Power System Engineer you will belong to Power Consulting, a department within Hitachi Energy working with both internal and external clients in the energy sector. You will be part of a renowned global team of power system and energy consultants. In the role, you will have the opportunity to contribute to the green transition and create a more sustainable energy future for all.

  

So, if you want to take the next step in your career, and contribute to develop a stronger, smarter, and greener energy system – Join us now! We are interested to learn more about you and what you can contribute with so don’t hesitate to apply even if you don’t meet all the requirements. A team with great cooperation and with diverse backgrounds is waiting for you to join it!

**Your responsibilities**

* In this exciting role, you will get the opportunity to take part in major assignments related to the green energy transition together with our consultants and experts from local as well as international Power Consulting offices.
* The assignments for the role are mainly system studies within the area of HVDC, FACTS, renewable energy integration, green hydrogen and power systems in general.
* As a Senior Power Systems Engineer, you are expected to take lead in assignments towards clients and to mentor junior colleagues.
* Cooperation and work in teams with leading specialists together with Hitachi Energy well-defined career path ensures exciting and motivating career with fast development along own interests and personality traits.
* You will be living Hitachi Energy core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.

**Your background**

* You hold a Master’s degree in electrical engineering, electrical power systems or similar.
* You have a great interest and at least three years of experience in the consulting and energy sector.
* Knowledge in power systems analysis and in software simulation tools such as PSS/E, PSCAD and/or DIgSILENT PowerFactory.
* Programming skill in Python, C++, etc. is a merit.
* You have an analytical mindset, you are independent, self-going and take your own initiatives to solve problems.
* As a person, you are collaborative and communicative.
* It is necessary to be fluent in English. Swedish is meritorious.

**What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working time
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout onboard phase
* Various trainings and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks
* More benefits could be connected to this specific role

**More about us**


The position is based in Gothenburg or Stockholm (Solna).


We are interested to learn more about you and what you can contribute with so don’t hesitate to apply even if you don’t meet all the requirements. A team with great cooperation and with diverse backgrounds is waiting for you to join!


Applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis, so don’t delay – apply today!


Recruiting Manager, Joachim Andersson, joachim.x.andersson@hitachienergy.com, will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives – Sveriges Ingenjörer: Mikael Hjort, +46 107-38 25 73; Ledarna: Frank Hollstedt, +46 107-38 70 43; Unionen: Fredrik Holmgren, +46 107-38 21 85. All other questions can be directed to Talent Partner, Tobias Nilsson, tobias.n.nilsson@hitachienergy.com.

**Qualified individuals with a disability may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Hitachi Energy career site as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by completing a** **general inquiry form** **on our website. Please include your contact information and specific details about your required accommodation to support you during the job application process.**

**This is solely for job seekers with disabilities requiring accessibility assistance or an accommodation in the job application process. Messages left for other purposes will not receive a response.**

title: AI Platform Engineer
description:
SAVR is a fast-growing Swedish fintech company on a mission to reinvent investing. We empower investors with a platform that offers **lower fees**, **greater transparency**, and a **radically improved experience**.


We’re not just building another investment service — we’re reimagining how financial products should work for people, not just institutions. As part of our ambitious, innovative and curious team, you’ll help shape the future of investing in Sweden and beyond.

**The Role – AI Platform Engineer**
-----------------------------------


As an AI Platform Engineer With Backend Skills in our cross-functional team, you are part of our tech team based in Stockholm or Halmstad. You will be a part of building and developing the next generation investment platform. Your role involves close collaboration with fellow Software Engineers, as well as with Data Scientists, Product Designers and Product Managers.


Our Tech Team Lead will manage and support your work, while reporting directly to our VP of Engineering. A glimpse into our tech stack: Terraform, Kotlin , Python, SQL, Snowflake, DBT, and we host on AWS.

  

**Your Mission**
----------------

* Provide direction and strategic insight on data related topics.
* Develop and implement efficient data pipelines, seamless integrations, and reliable storage solutions to meet both operational demands and advanced analytics requirements.
* Design and deploy models with a focus on production readiness, ensuring smooth integration into our services.
* Build and maintain key platform features, APIs, and services, prioritizing scalability, reliability, and top-tier performance.
* Further Develop of Data Layer solution on snowflake

**Additionally you will**
-------------------------

* Drive ideas and develop concepts from a tech perspective.
* Contribute to improving the architecture, tech stack, and operational methods.
* Develop integrations with third-party APIs and tools.
* Follow and promote good engineering practices to deliver high-quality products.
* Engage in code reviews and foster a culture of continuous learning through constructive feedback.
* Be a positive force for our team culture
**You’ll Thrive in This Role If You...**
----------------------------------------

* 4+ years of professional team-based software development experience.
* Experience working with scalable, product-based environments.
* Solid understanding of database design, SQL, and ETL pipelines.
* Experience implementing data science workflows, including working with datasets, analytics tools, or machine learning models.
* Strong collaboration skills and an open-minded approach to exchanging ideas.
* Fluent in English and a team player who values diverse perspectives.
* Swedish citizen or valid EU work permits (we cannot offer visa sponsorship for this role).

  


  

We’re seeking a motivated engineer with a broad skill set and passion for Data/ML, backend systems, and analytics. You are someone who thrives in a collaborative, fast-paced environment and is eager to contribute to building something great.

**Our Cultural DNA**
--------------------


At SAVR, we’re:


**Open-minded** – we embrace new ideas, diverse perspectives, and continuous learning


**Bold** – we take smart risks, move fast, and aren’t afraid to fail forward


**Honest** – we value transparency, feedback, and doing the right thing

  


We’re a startup, so things can be a little messy — and that’s part of the thrill. If you thrive in building as a team and handling uncertainty, you will fit right in.

**What’s In It for You**
------------------------


You’ll join a product- and design-driven company where your work has real impact. We keep things lean, move fast, and genuinely care about the experience we deliver — for customers and for each other.


Here’s what we offer:


Top-tier work gear


Competitive salary

  

‍️ Generous wellness allowance


Insurance package


Occupational pension and long-term savings support


*Office-first approach* to foster collaboration and quick decision-making — with flexibility when you need it (4+1)


*Stocked pantry*, plus regular social gatherings and wellness activities to keep energy and culture high

**Our Commitment to Diversity**
-------------------------------


SAVR is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome people from all backgrounds, identities, and experiences. We believe diverse teams build better products and are committed to creating an inclusive workplace where everyone can thrive.

### **Ready to Join Us?**


We’d love to hear from you. Apply now or reach out with any questions — and let’s build something meaningful together.

title: Team Manager System Supervision & Communication - HVDC Control & Protection Software
description:
**Description**


**The opportunity**


We are looking for an engaging and driven person who wants to grow together with their team and the company. You will be responsible for managing one of our software design and integration teams within the HVDC Control & Protection Software area. The team is responsible for supplying System Supervision & Communication for HVDC projects across the globe including software design, development, integration, testing and verification in real-time and virtual environments.

*"At Hitachi Energy, we’re not just advancing technology—we’re advancing people. Join us to drive innovation, guide high-performing team, and shape the future of energy through inclusive leadership and technical excellence. Empower tomorrow—starting today." – Elmira Birkehag, Manager Systems – HVDC Control & Protection Software.*

**How you’ll make an impact**

* Lead with purpose: Be a role model for your team by living Hitachi Energy’s Leadership Pillars – living our vision, fostering collaboration, delivering promises, and nurturing talent.
* Empower your team: Manage a team of System Engineers with responsibility of HVDC C&P System Supervision & Communication software involving design, integration and testing in both virtual and real-time systems.
* Plan for future: Shape team composition, individual development, and competencies to meet evolving business needs.
* Communicate progress: Report activities, progress, and risks to senior management and project stakeholders.
* Drive strategic initiatives: Adapt and implement HVDC Control & Protection Software strategies and align with your team’s goals and the company’s vision.
* Ensure excellence: Develop, document, and monitor work processes to ensure your team delivers high-quality results.

**Your background**

* Passion for leadership: You have a genuine interest in empowering individuals and care for team growth. Experience as a people manager is a strong advantage.
